description: Enforces strong local password policy: sets minimum length to 12, enables complexity, caps lockout threshold at 5, disables autologon, and forces password change for enabled local users without a password. Emits NDJSON (summary + per-change lines) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback. Requires administrative privileges.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
